description: Complete catalog of AWS services using public AWS Architecture Icons from https://aws.amazon.com/architecture/icons/

shapes.name: EC2
shapes.description: Elastic Compute Cloud - virtual servers in the cloud

shapes.name: Elastic Beanstalk
shapes.description: Elastic Beanstalk - application deployment and management

shapes.name: Batch
shapes.description: AWS Batch - fully managed batch computing

shapes.name: Auto Scaling
shapes.description: EC2 Auto Scaling - automatic capacity adjustment

shapes.name: ECR
shapes.description: Elastic Container Registry - Docker container registry

shapes.name: Fargate
shapes.description: AWS Fargate - serverless compute for containers

shapes.name: FSx
shapes.description: FSx - fully managed third-party file systems

shapes.name: EBS
shapes.description: Elastic Block Store - block storage volumes for EC2

shapes.name: Storage Gateway
shapes.description: Storage Gateway - hybrid cloud storage integration

shapes.name: RDS
shapes.description: Relational Database Service - managed relational databases

shapes.name: Aurora
shapes.description: Aurora - MySQL and PostgreSQL compatible relational database

shapes.name: VPC
shapes.description: Virtual Private Cloud - isolated network environment

shapes.name: API Gateway
shapes.description: API Gateway - create and manage APIs

shapes.name: Elastic Load Balancing
shapes.description: Elastic Load Balancing - distribute traffic (ALB, NLB, CLB)

shapes.name: Transit Gateway
shapes.description: Transit Gateway - connect VPCs and on-premises networks

shapes.name: Direct Connect
shapes.description: Direct Connect - dedicated network connection to AWS

shapes.name: Global Accelerator
shapes.description: Global Accelerator - improve application availability and performance

shapes.name: Cloud Map
shapes.description: Cloud Map - service discovery for cloud resources

shapes.name: App Mesh
shapes.description: App Mesh - application-level networking for microservices

shapes.name: NAT Gateway
shapes.description: NAT Gateway - enable outbound internet access

shapes.name: Internet Gateway
shapes.description: Internet Gateway - allow VPC internet access

shapes.name: Client VPN
shapes.description: Client VPN - managed client-based VPN service

shapes.name: SQS
shapes.description: Simple Queue Service - fully managed message queuing

shapes.name: Amazon MQ
shapes.description: Amazon MQ - managed message broker (ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ)

shapes.name: IAM
shapes.description: Identity and Access Management - manage access to AWS

shapes.name: Cognito
shapes.description: Cognito - user sign-up, sign-in, and access control

shapes.name: KMS
shapes.description: Key Management Service - create and control encryption keys

shapes.name: Secrets Manager
shapes.description: Secrets Manager - rotate, manage, and retrieve credentials

shapes.name: WAF
shapes.description: Web Application Firewall - protect web applications

shapes.name: Macie
shapes.description: Macie - discover and protect sensitive data

shapes.name: Certificate Manager
shapes.description: Certificate Manager - provision and manage SSL/TLS certificates

shapes.name: Directory Service
shapes.description: Directory Service - managed Microsoft Active Directory

shapes.name: Security Hub
shapes.description: Security Hub - unified security and compliance center

shapes.name: Athena
shapes.description: Athena - interactive query service for S3

shapes.name: Lake Formation
shapes.description: Lake Formation - set up secure data lakes

shapes.name: CloudTrail
shapes.description: CloudTrail - track user activity and API usage

shapes.name: Config
shapes.description: AWS Config - assess and audit resource configurations

shapes.name: Systems Manager
shapes.description: Systems Manager - operational insights and automation

shapes.name: Organizations
shapes.description: Organizations - centrally manage multiple AWS accounts

shapes.name: Service Catalog
shapes.description: Service Catalog - create and manage catalogs of IT services

shapes.name: Control Tower
shapes.description: Control Tower - set up and govern multi-account AWS environment

shapes.name: X-Ray
shapes.description: X-Ray - analyze and debug distributed applications

shapes.name: Cloud9
shapes.description: Cloud9 - cloud IDE for writing and debugging code

shapes.name: SageMaker
shapes.description: SageMaker - build, train, and deploy ML models

shapes.name: Textract
shapes.description: Textract - extract text and data from documents

shapes.name: Bedrock
shapes.description: Bedrock - build and scale generative AI applications

shapes.name: SES
shapes.description: Simple Email Service - email sending and receiving

shapes.name: IoT Core
shapes.description: IoT Core - connect IoT devices to the cloud

shapes.name: Greengrass
shapes.description: Greengrass - edge computing for IoT devices
